block.p: N.B.A. TORONTO RAPTORS--Signed F Luke Jackson for the remainder of this season and the 2007-08 season.
N.F.L. CLEVELAND BROWNS--Signed TE Steve Heiden to a four-year contract extension. INDIANAPOLIS COLTS--Re-signed QB Jim Sorgi.
N.H.L. NHL--Suspended Nashville F Alexander Radulov one game for a hitting-from-behind incident involving San Jose F Steve Bernier in a game on April 13.
American Hockey League GRAND RAPIDS GRIFFINS--Signed LW Jan Mursak.
WICHITA STATE--Named Gregg Marshall men's basketball coach. WINTHROP--Named Randy Peele men's basketball coach.

American Hockey League GRAND RAPIDS GRIFFINS--Signed LW Jan Mursak.
WICHITA STATE--Named Gregg Marshall men's basketball coach. WINTHROP--Named Randy Peele men's basketball coach.
